DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this research study is to better understand African American women's hair and hair styling practices and how these practices affect attitudes and viewpoints regarding exercise.
DOC.brief_title: The Impact of African American Women's Hair Care Practices and Hair Attitudes on Exercise Habits
DOC.criteria: Female between 21 and 60 years old. African, AfroCaribbean, or African American decent. Able and willing to follow study procedures and successfully complete hair and exercise questionnaire/survey. Unable to read or understand hair and exercise questionnaire/survey.
DOC.keyword: African American females between the ages of 21 and 60
